title: 405: CHATTY BROS: Clairvoyant Medium Bros w/ Thomas Dale
itunes:title: 405: CHATTY BROS: Clairvoyant Medium Bros w/ Thomas Dale
description:
#Broadsquad favorite Thomas Dale (Clairvoyant/Medium/Heyoka empath) is back and he does a reading with The Bros! Tune in to hear this incredible episode that left Grayston and Evan’s jaws on the floor!

 

***Join The Broads, Bekah and Jess, tomorrow for a fantastic episode with a very special guest! 

 

THOMAS DALE:

Follow Thomas on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/thomasdale5/ 

Book a session with Thomas: http://kewenthomas.com/ 

 

THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS:

***VEGAMOUR: Go to VEGAMOUR.COM/CHATTY and use code CHATTY to save 20% on your first order!

***MILK BAR: Get $10 off any order of $50 or more when you go to MILKBARSTORE.COM/CHATTY

***FUZZY: Go to YOURFUZZY.COM/CHATTY for a FREE 7-day trial, and access to exclusive member discounts on pet meds, supplements, food, and more!

***EVERLYWELL: Get 20% off an at-home lab test at EVERLYWELL.COM/CHATTY  

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
